entity.name: Criminal Minds
entity.description:
An elite squad of FBI profilers analyzes the country's most-twisted criminal minds.

Photo via @CrimMinds_CBS

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
entity.description: A dedicated group of forensic investigators at the Las Vegas Crime Lab work to solve often-grisly crimes in Sin City. Heading up the graveyard shift (an appropriate term in this case) is supervisor D.B. Russell, who is a `Left Coast' Sherlock Holmes who devours crime novels. The members of Russell's team include Catherine Willows, Nick Stokes, Sara Sidle (the team's moral compass), Greg Sanders and Morgan Brody. The team works closely with Capt Jim Brass, a seasoned detective who is a protector of CSI - sometimes to a fault. Previous heads of the group include Gus Grissom and Dr Raymond Langston.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Criminal Minds
entity.description: An elite squad of FBI profilers analyse the country's most twisted criminal minds, anticipating the perpetrators' next moves before they can strike again. Each member of the `mind hunter' team brings his or her expertise to the table to pinpoint predators' motivations and identify emotional triggers in order to stop them.

entity.name: Esprits Criminels
entity.description: Une section d'élite du FBI, spécialisée en psychologie, analyse les esprits criminels les plus tortueux, essayant de prévoir leurs prochains gestes avant qu'ils ne les commettent. Chaque membre de l'équipe apporte son expertise afin de les arrêter.
